ratings.comment: He seems so unhappy. It's really hard to deal with a professors personal baggage. I feel bad for the guy but he's not a good teacher.
Talks too much. Often late. Picks cool songs but we're never prepared.

Very knowledgable and musical, but would make a better theorist than teacher. Always seems angry and doesn't give much (if any) positive feedback to the group, the criticisms are done with a raised tone, and then blames the group for not looking excited. Lectures too much during choir. Very sarcastic sense of humor. Not an inspiring conductor.

Bruce is an amazing conductor. He makes you WANT to sing and enjoy the pieces he chooses. Not to mention how hilarious he is. But in my experience, what stuck out the most was how personal he was. He really cares about his students and their feelings and well-being. I had the opportunity to be in concert choir but I wouldn't leave Bruce!
I've never had a director who's so passionate and talented as Bruce. Did I mention he's hilarious? We've even started a twitter handle for him to share all his funny quips!
Absolutely the best the department has to offer!

He is an amazing professor who picks aamazing concert rep.  I would deffinatly to music AND non-music majors.  He is always willing to help you with whatever you need. He is a teacher worth your time.

A hilariously amazing conductor. Not to mention his impecable dress and beautiful voice (and face..). Rescheduled a private audition for me multiple times until a time worked and let me in after the class was already full. This man is definitely as fabulous as his facebook group claims.
Bruce is an amazing teacher. He found solo pieces for me to sing for an audition in time outside of the classroom. Not many college professors would do that.
Oh yes indeed, Bruce is the best.  Every year he gets a little less catty, as well.  Bonus!
easily the most phenomenal conductor you will ever work with.  amazingly talented.
Bruce is amazing.  The best professor/teacher I have ever had.  By far.  Did I mention he is hilarious?  and gorgeous?  He has a club on the facebook devoted to his fabulousness.

bruce is absolutely amazing! (not to mention the older guy sexiness about him...)  seriously though, i really respect his command and knowledge of music and his ever-popular ways of communicating it to his students...  take this class!!!

Seriously the best musician I have met in my life.  He takes his work seriously while having fun with it.  It is clear he is passionate about his work and cares that his students get the most out of their experience in his class.  I am forever indebted to him for what he has taught me in Choral Conducting.
what can i say? hes amazing, hot, talented, caring, did i say hot? best dirrector i have ever had in my 12 years of singing professionally! and hes hot!
The best choral director I've ever worked with!
Bruce Almighty! Professional, impeccable, knowledgeable, precise, lighthearted, and worldly. Excellent man and class.

BEST conductor I ever worked with. Vast knowledge of composition, vocal technique, the importance building nuances into choral phrasing...gets his choirs to emote/tell a story...high expectations (his groups always achieve them) and professionalism.

Bruce is the best choir director i have ever had.  He is so funny and****and lighthearted that the class is seriously SO much fun.  He always makes jokes or funny little quips that make the hour go way faster than it should.  BG rocks!
No Comments
I love Bruce!  He's so dreamy!
